name: Raistlin
description:
The test of High Sorcery for Raistlin consist in a simulation of a dungeon run. The wizard stands on a single tile and he can't move, he have to use his magic and mental powers to clear the dungeons of enemies.

You control Raistlin!!

They will shoot fireballs at you, and if they hit you, you'll fall to the abyss! You can't move but you can cast spells with your mouse to redirect the fireballs and destroy the wizards!

Controls:

- Mouse to generate barriers.

- Space to generate a fireball (needs mana > 50)

Notes:

- Mana will regenerate every second.

- You can redirect a ball to an exit to make it go.
